tree.name: Dwight Powell
tree.tradeDescription: Dallas acquired Powell and Rajon Rondo from Boston for Jae Crowder, Brandan Wright, Jameer Nelson, a 2015 1st and a 2016 2nd
tree.note: Stanford forward, 2014 #45 pick by Charlotte, traded to Boston on draft night

assetsGivenUp.name: Jae Crowder
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: CLE traded Crowder (#34), Jared Cunningham (#24), and Bernard James (#33) to DAL for Tyler Zeller (#17) and Kelenna Azubuike
assetsGivenUp.note: Marquette forward, drafted #34 by Cleveland, traded to Dallas on draft night

assetsGivenUp.name: 2012 DAL #17 Overall Pick
assetsGivenUp.note: Dallas own 2012 first-round pick, sent to Cleveland on draft night

assetsGivenUp.name: Brandan Wright
assetsGivenUp.note: UNC forward, 2007 #8 pick by Charlotte. Signed as free agent after being waived by New Jersey Nets.

assetsGivenUp.name: Jameer Nelson
assetsGivenUp.note: Saint Joseph's guard, signed as free agent from Orlando
